description.text: You may not be able to use all features, but you are anonymous, and we don't ask you for any identifying information or store any data. Anonymous data will be collected and used to optimize app performance.
See what's happening around you. We use Wi-Fi and Bluetooth location services to improve your experience, but we never store that data.
You can personalize and customize the app. Wi-Fi and Bluetooth location data is stored over time to make recommendations and improve your overall app experience.

Let the app work for you.
You can access your i-card, save credit cards to make future purchases easier, use Illini ID, and get notifications based on your specific interests.
Access all features, get connected to campus, and let the app suggest tailored experiences that you and your friends can all enjoy.

entries2.title: View Only
entries2.description: View events and dining locations around campus.
entries2.dataUsage: These features do not use or store your location.

entries2.title: Location Sharing
entries2.description: View events and dining locations near you.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature uses location services but does not store your location.

entries2.title: Personalizations
entries2.description: View events and dining locations near you.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature uses location services, personal information and items you have starred in the app.

entries2.title: Notifications
entries2.description: Get notifications including reminders about events you have starred in the app.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature sends notifications utilizing location services, personal information and places you have starred in the app.

entries2.title: View Only
entries2.description: See all upcoming schedules for athletic events, real-time scoring, rosters and athletic news.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature does not use or store your location.

entries2.title: Location Sharing
entries2.description: Find seats, nearby restrooms & concession stands. See real-time parking availability and directions.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature uses location services but does not store your location.

entries2.title: Personalizations
entries2.description: Customize your experience to see schedules, rosters, scores and news for your favorite Illini teams.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature uses location services, personal preferences and events you have starred in the app.

entries2.title: Notifications
entries2.description: Receive notifications of event start and final scores for your favorite teams.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature uses location services, personal preferences and events you have starred in the app.

entries2.title: Identity
entries2.description: May store credit card information to buy tickets for athletic events.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature uses location services, personal preferences, credit card information and starred items.

entries2.title: Personalizations
entries2.description: Check your Illini ID, MTD bus pass, Illini Cash, Meal Plan balances and see past transactions.
entries2.dataUsage: These features use your personal university credentials.

entries2.title: Identity
entries2.description: Check your Illini ID, MTD bus pass, Illini Cash, Meal Plan balances and see past transactions.
entries2.dataUsage: These features use your personal university credentials.

entries2.title: View Only
entries2.description: Locate and connect to resources to assist you with your EIGHT DIMENSIONS of health and wellness.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature does not use or store your location.

entries2.title: Location Sharing
entries2.description: Get wayfinding assistance to health and wellness resources on campus.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature uses location services but does not store your location.

entries2.title: Notifications
entries2.description: Get notifications of upcoming appointments and additional screening you should take.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature sends notifications based on your upcoming appointments and screenings.

entries2.title: View Only
entries2.description: View a map of campus with places of interest, MTD bus stops and schedules.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature does not use or store your location.

entries2.title: Location Sharing
entries2.description: View a map of campus with places of interest, MTD bus destinations and stops with bus directions.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature uses location services but does not store your location.

entries2.title: Personalizations
entries2.description: Navigate campus with places of interest to you.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature uses location services, personal information and places you have starred in the app.

entries2.title: Notifications
entries2.description: Receive personalized notifications based on your location.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature sends notifications utilizing location services, personal information and places you have starred in the app.

entries2.title: Sharing
entries2.description: Potentially share your location with others.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature uses location services and may share your location with others.

entries2.title: View Only
entries2.description: View a list of existing groups.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature does not use any of your data.

entries2.title: Location Sharing
entries2.description: View a list of existing groups.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature does not use any of your data.

entries2.title: Personalizations
entries2.description: View a list of existing groups.
entries2.dataUsage: This feature does not use any of your data.

entries2.title: Notifications
entries2.description: Join, view and interact with groups when signed in. Get notifications on group events, posts and polls for groups you belong to.
entries2.dataUsage: These features use information that you and others contribute to a group.

entries2.title: Sharing
entries2.description: Create group events, posts and polls for groups you belong to.
entries2.dataUsage: These features share information that you contribute to a group.

entries2.title: View Only
entries2.description: View your building access, campus guides, crisis help, campus reminders, due date catalog, the Illinois Twitter feed, etc.
entries2.dataUsage: Building access and due date catalog require a university sign in.

entries2.title: Location Sharing
entries2.description: View your building access, campus guides, crisis help, campus reminders, due date catalog and the Illinois Twitter feed.
entries2.dataUsage: Building access and due date catalog require a university sign in.

entries2.title: Personalizations
entries2.description: View your Research projects, building access, campus guides, crisis help, campus reminders, due date catalog, the Illinois Twitter feed, etc.
entries2.dataUsage: Research projects, building access and due date catalog require a university sign in. Your answers to a Research interest form are used to qualify you to participate in a research project.

entries2.title: Notifications
entries2.description: You may receive notifications when content is updated, research project qualification, appointments, group membership and you can star various content.
entries2.dataUsage: Research participation, Building access and due date catalog require a university sign in. Your answers to a Research interest form are used to qualify you to participate in research projects.

entries2.title: Sharing
entries2.description: You may receive notifications when content is updated, research project qualification, appointments, group membership and you can star various content.
entries2.dataUsage: Research participation, Building access and due date catalog require a university sign in. Your answers to a Research interest form are used to qualify you to participate in research projects.

features2.text: Not share your data with others.
